com.osoc6.OSOC6.anonymousTest.ForgotPasswordTest
@SpringBootTest @AutoConfigureMockMvc public class ForgotPasswordTest extends TestFunctionProvider<ResetPasswordToken,Long,ResetPasswordTokenRepository>
Class testing the forgot and reset password process.

    • mailUser

      @Value("${spring.mail.username}") private String mailUser
      The username of the account to send mails from. This will use the one defined in test/java/resources/application.properties.

    • mailPassword

      @Value("${spring.mail.password}") private String mailPassword
      The password of the account to send mails from. This will use the one defined in test/java/resources/application.properties.
